title: FS:  **SOLD** T206 Addie Joss Port - PSA4
author: Edwolf1963

posts.post_title: FS:  **SOLD** T206 Addie Joss Port - PSA4
posts.post_content:
SOLD - thank you!!  FS:  Addie Joss Portrait Card, SC350, PSA4.  Very nice card, clean, good centering - no paper loss or creases.  See scans, a solid 4!  $225 delivered, PayPal (payment owed), check or MO.  First communication (PM, Post or Email)  I'm just going to list this one this once, no bumping for price drops.  Dupe that I thought someone may need?

Many thanks, as always!
